channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- Ruckus Networks Unleashed APs and Zone Director
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- Ruckus Networks Unleashed APs and Zone Director

item.title: CVE-2017-6229|2024-08-05T15:25:48.601Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- ruckus%20networks%20unleashed%20aps%20and%20zone%20director
item.description: Ruckus Networks Unleashed AP firmware releases before 200.6.10.1.x and Ruckus Networks Zone Director firmware releases 10.1.0.0.x, 9.10.2.0.x, 9.12.3.0.x, 9.13.3.0.x, 10.0.1.0.x or before contain authenticated Root Command Injection in the CLI that could allow authenticated valid users to execute privileged commands on the respective systems.
